description.value: ValueSet containing orderable drug representations for each member in the Anatomical Therapeutic Chemical (ATC1-4) Corticosteroids For Systemic Use drug class (id: H02). RxNorm: getRelatedByType (SBD,SCD)

purpose.value: Provide terminology for PDDI CDS FHIR resources
